segments.text: You must be Wily . It's nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you , Mr . Wilson .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , Wily , you have been with IBM for two years ready for change ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think I'm ready for new challenges .
segments.speaker: S2
